newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: PHIBOR rates mostly soft on high liquidity.
newsitem.headline: PHIBOR rates mostly soft on high liquidity.

text.p: Philippine interbank offered rates (PHIBOR) were largely lower on Monday as banks dropped their swap points on hope of a slide in spot rates soon, traders said.
"The Central Bank may likely lower its overnight rates on Tuesday to mop up liquidity in the system," said a senior foreign bank trader.
But banks remain cautious on their medium and long term outlook as shown by the defiance of the three-month and one-year bills of the downward trend, traders said..
The three-month bill was up 11-5/16 percent from 11.0 percent while the one-year bill inched up 11 1/8 percent from 11.0 percent.
